original_text: They brought 12 small dishes that people had made from gold. Each small dish weighed ten shekels. They were each full of incense. All the gold weighed 120 shekels.
korean_text: 또 향을 채운 금 그릇이 열둘이니 성소의 세겔로 각각 열 세겔 무게라 그 그릇의 금이 모두 백이십 세겔이요

sentences.original_text: that people had made from gold
Each small dish weighed ten shekels
sentences.korean_translation: 각 작은 대접은 열 세겔 무게였다

sentences.original_text: They were each full of incense
